_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The all, without directly knowing and co: Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by ear contact
Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by nose contact
Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by tongue contact
Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by body contact
Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
The all, directly knowing and completely: Painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
